artist: Artist: Aki Fujiyoshi , et al.; Author: Yolanda Ward , et al.; Editor: Seth Tobocman , et al.; Publisher: World War 3 llustrated, New York

description: Saddle stitched binding, text and illustration of the Statue of Libert, made of one dollar bills and crying blood, printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 72 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: World War 3 Illustrated #6
